abstract: Schlumberger, the oil-field services company, bid up to $679 million for a Norwegian-listed company, Eastern Echo, on Tuesday to expand its seismic operations at a time when record oil prices are driving demand.
lead_paragraph: Schlumberger, the oil-field services company, bid up to $679 million for a Norwegian-listed company, Eastern Echo, on Tuesday to expand its seismic operations at a time when record oil prices are driving demand.

headline.main: Schlumberger Offers $679 Million for Eastern Echo
